attributes.action: Immediate deportation/extradition for Abu Qatada and other foreign born nationals with known terrorist links
attributes.additional_details: We demand that the government of the United Kingdom enforce immediate extradition of Abu Qatada, Abu Hamza and others with known links to terrorist groups or who openly preach a doctrine of hatred against the law abiding citizens of this country without further delay.We demand that foreign nationals with terrorist links be denied any and all forms of legal aid and this to be enshrined in British law and enforced.  We demand that foreign nationals such as the above be denied any and all access to British funds including social housing and NHS treatment.  We demand immediate deportation of all family members back to their country. We demand refusal of legal aid and all public funds to such people to be enshrined in law
